mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_use_id, product_id, orders_name, orders_phone, orders_address, orders_date) VALUES (#{userUseId}, #{productId}, #{ordersName}, #{ordersPhone}, #{ordersAddress}, #{ordersDate})
mapper.select: SELECT o.orders_id, o.user_use_id, o.product_id, o.orders_date, o.orders_name AS ordersName, o.orders_phone AS ordersPhone, o.orders_address AS ordersAddress, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_description AS productDescription, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE user_use_id = #{userUseId}
select * from orders where product_id = #{productId} and user_use_id = #{userId}
